description:
Sources:
Lift the Veil with Isaac Kappy:
https://youtu.be/_Znh-WuM9zI?t=2196  - First time
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pJiW5SnEUd4 - Last Time

Titus Frost (Spitting Truth With Titus) with Isaac Kappy:
https://youtu.be/sGHXZx41zFo?t=2470

Secret Order of Foolish Transparency - hidden drop:
https://steemit.com/politics/@c-change/protocols-of-the-illuminated-suns-of-the-golden-dawn

Soundtrack provided by Community Infiltrator here:   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zGi1l5d_NyE

Green Room Discord:  https://discord.gg/62nDHN
^If you make it in there, you could make it on the show :)

Wai - 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=axaH4HFzA24

https://www.sharetanzania.co.uk/
Truth Matters:  https://bit.ly/2CHsQBg
Throat for rent (verbal only, non-negotiable): grimgriz at g mail
Shill Revealed:  https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz
